        public static boolean Lines(double x1,
                            double y1,
                            double x2,
                            double y2,
                            double x3,

                            double x4,
                            double y4)
        Returns true if lines intersect. adapted from http://tog.acm.org/resources/GraphicsGems/gemsii/xlines.c
        Parameters:
        x1 - first line segment's starting x
        y1 - first line segment's starting y
        x2 - first line segment's ending x
        y2 - first line segment's ending y
        x3 - second line segment's starting x
        y3 - second line segment's starting y
        x4 - second line segment's ending x
        y4 - second line segment's ending y
        Returns:
